title: Salsa

default: 1 red onion, peeled and finely chopped or 4 spring onions, trimmed and sliced
1 jalapeno chilli, de-veined, de-seeded and finely chopped
225g/8oz fresh ripe fruit such as melon, mango, papaya, pineapple, peach
large bunch of fresh coriander, chopped roughly

steps: Chop the tomatoes and fruit into the same sized chunks - about ½cm/¼in.
Mix in a large bowl with the rest of the ingredients.
Leave to stand for 30 minutes to let all the flavours merge.
